ComicInfo.Title: [Untitled]; Dear Penpal
ComicInfo.Summary:
Gumball has learned that it’s the suit that makes the man, and the bigger the shoulder pads, the better!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Irene Flores | 1 | B | Cover B | Marc Ellerby | 2 | C | Cover C | Nneka Meyers | 3 |
